gold.user: User requests to list all SIP domains associated with their Twilio account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of SIP domains in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to create a new SIP domain with specific settings.
gold.ideal: Creates a new SIP domain and returns the details of the created domain.

gold.user: User needs to fetch details of a specific SIP domain using its SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified SIP domain.

gold.user: User wants to update settings for an existing SIP domain.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified SIP domain and returns the updated details.

gold.user: User intends to delete a specific SIP domain from their account.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified SIP domain and confirms the deletion.
